name: Berry Chocolate Mug Cake Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, vegetable oil, milk, chocolate chips, whipped cream, blueberry, raspberry, fresh mint
recipeInstructionSteps: Spray the inside of a microwave-safe ceramic mug. Add in flour, cocoa powder, sugar, and baking powder. Mix to combine.
Add the vegetable oil, milk, and stir until smooth. Stir in the chocolate chips.
Microwave on high for 1 minute 30 seconds. Let cool completely.
Top with whipped cream, sprinkle on fresh blueberries, raspberries, and mint.
